original: intros m x y i j Hinv Hprec Heq Hexpf Hle. assert (Hcase: expf m x y0 \/ ~ expf m x y0) by apply classic. destruct Hcase as [Hexpf_positive | Hnot_expf]. - assert (Hiter: Iter (cF (L m one x y)) (j + 1) x = x) by (apply cF_L1_y0_x with (y_1 := cA_1 m one y) (j := j); auto). rewrite Heq in Hiter. apply diff_cF_L1_x_y0 with (i := i) in Hiter; auto. contradict Hiter. rewrite <- Hiter. apply cF_L1_y_1_x10 with (x1 := cA m one x) (x10 := cA m zero (cA m one x)); auto. - apply cF_L1_y_1_y0_aux. + auto. + auto. + auto. + apply le_trans with (j + 1 + i); try apply le_n_S; auto.
